product_name: Boardworks Raven Stand Up Paddle Board - 11' 6"
long_description: Designed for glide and stability in flat or choppy water, this beautifully crafted board is ideal for touring, fitness, and recreational racing on lakes, bays, harbors and deep, docile rivers.
short_description: Designed for glide and stability in flat or choppy water, this beautifully crafted board is ideal for touring, fitness, and recreational racing on lakes, bays, harbors and deep, docile rivers.
